About the Company: agjanani Textiles Limited is a public limited company promoted and managed by professionals having long experience of Textile Industry. It is listed on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE). The mills are situated at RIICO Industrial Area Bagru, Jaipur, Rajasthan, India. Jaipur is 270 kms from delhi in north west of india. The site is 25 km from Jaipur (on NH-8 Jaipur Ajmer Road) near the Mahindra SEZ.
